queries.nrql: from K8sPodSample select uniqueCount(podName) as 'Total Pods', filter(uniqueCount(podName), where status = 'Running') as 'Running Pods', filter(uniqueCount(podName), where status = 'Pending') as 'Pending Pods', filter(uniqueCount(podName), where status = 'Failed') as 'Failed Pods' since 30 minutes ago

from K8sPodSample select uniqueCount(podName) as 'Total Pods', filter(uniqueCount(podName), where status = 'Running') as 'Running Pods', filter(uniqueCount(podName), where status = 'Pending') as 'Pending Pods', filter(uniqueCount(podName), where status = 'Failed') as 'Failed Pods' since 30 minutes ago
FROM K8sPodSample select uniqueCount(podName) as 'Pod Count' where status is not null facet clusterName, status since 30 minutes ago limit 1000
